About Me

BIO

Hi, my name is Aaron Cole. I am a student at Northview Public Schools, with a passion for web and application development. I am a quick learner, a team player, and always ready for new challenges.

Developer

Front-End

I specialize in building dynamic, responsive websites using modern HTML5, CSS3 (with Sass), and JavaScript (including frameworks like React). My focus is on clean, efficient code that provides a seamless user experience across devices.

Developer

Back-End

I work with Node.js and Express to create scalable and efficient back-end systems. I have experience with databases like MySQL and MongoDB, and I'm familiar with RESTful APIs and AJAX for dynamic data handling.

Designer

Responsive & User-Centered

As a UI/UX designer, I focus on building intuitive, responsive web applications that enhance user satisfaction. I aim for clean, minimal, and functional designs that prioritize usability and accessibility.
